item.title: VMware News Roundup - Announcement-ageddon!!!
item.description: There was armageddon, then snowmageddon and now announcementageddon. Twitter is on fire with frantic retweeting and updates on what people are excited about on the VMware front. And there’s plenty to be excited about right now. The biggest unsurprising but best bit is vSphere 6.0 goes GA. Now everyone can try long distance vmotion, VVols, 4vcpu Fault Tolerance, Instant Clone and more. Register for a trial and download below https://my.vmware.com/group/vmware/evalcenter?p=vsphere6#src=vmw_so_vex_cneal_850
